title: Apphub: Display useful information about a certificate
body: It displays the certificate signer information, but you could easily upload two certificates with different CNs (service names) issued by a single CA and you would have no way of telling them apart.  Minimally it should show the CN from the subject which matches the service name you provide in client code, along with the CN of the signer.  Ideally it would allow you to download the certificate for verification or at least provide a md5 hash of the uploaded certificate.
